name: Melee weapon
description: Good for combat that is close up and personal.

name: Thrown weapon
description: The simplest form of ranged weapon that benefits of the strength of its user.

name: Archaic ranged weapon
description: This includes the ranged weapons that you don't simply throw but came before the era of gunpowder. Like s slingshot, bow or crossbow.

name: Projectile weapon
description: These weapons accelerate a solid physical projectile towards their target. Usually powered by gunpowder.

name: Energy weapon
description: The most advanced weaponry. Deadly but also pricey.

name: Heavy weapon
description: Slow but for the big damage. Heavy weapons are always two-handed.
